message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SI 

This paper deals with online content recommendation, which is a problem commonly studied in the fields of machine learning (cs.LG), information retrieval (cs.IR), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of pairwise comparisons and the formulation of the dueling bandit problem also suggest a connection to the field of decision making under uncertainty (cs.DS). Finally, the numerical experiments and evaluation of algorithms suggest a focus on practical applications and implementation, which could fall under the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
